name: 20 Seconds (Bastien Laurans (Hyuse))
description:
20 Seconds is a puzzle game where you incarnate a scientist who lose control of his time experiment. Your laboratory is stuck in a 20 seconds loop.

Will you successfully escape from this area ?

Context :

This project was made with the constraint of being an FPS with an original concept, so I choose the time loop. 

I hope you will enjoy this little experience.
